data.title: Application of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide (The Gambia v. Myanmar
data.text:
Application of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide (The Gambia v. Myanmar) - The Court decides that the declarations of intervention filed by seven States are admissible

Procedure(s):Intervention

Available in:

Application of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide (The Gambia v. Myanmar) - Canada, Denmark, France, Germany, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom (jointly) and the Maldives file declarations of intervention in the proceedings under Article 63 of the Statute

Procedure(s):Intervention

Available in:
